nodes.text: The Praxis Mk. I turbo speeder, more commonly known as the Jedi turbo speeder, was a model of airspeeder used by the Jedi Order in the waning days of the Galactic Republic.

During the Clone Wars, Jedi Master Plo Koon and Padawan Ahsoka Tano used a turbo speeder to travel to the Coruscant underworld seeking information on Boba Fett from some of the seedier locales that Jango Fett used to frequent.
